mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJSCHEDULE(PJTSEQ, SCHSEQ) VALUES((SELECT PJTSEQ FROM PROJECT WHERE PJTSEQ=#{param1}), (SELECT SCHSEQ FROM SCHEDULE WHERE SCHSEQ=#{param2}))
mapper.select: SELECT SCHSEQ, STARTTIME, ENDTIME FROM SCHEDULE WHERE SCHSEQ=(SELECT SCHSEQ FROM PROJSCHEDULE WHERE PJTSEQ=#{param1})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TASKSCHEDULE(PJTSEQ, SCHSEQ, TSKSEQ) VALUES(#{param1},#{param2},#{param3} )
mapper.select: SELECT SCHSEQ, STARTTIME, ENDTIME FROM SCHEDULE WHERE SCHSEQ=#{schSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE SCHEDULE SET STARTTIME=#{startTime}, ENDTIME=#{endTime} WHERE SCHSEQ=#{schSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT S.STARTTIME, S.ENDTIME, NS.NSCONTENT AS TITLE, 'NOTICE' AS ENTRY FROM NOTSCHEDULE NS JOIN SCHEDULE S ON NS.SCHSEQ = S.SCHSEQ UNION SELECT S.STARTTIME, S.ENDTIME, PM.PJTNAME AS TITLE, 'PROJECT' AS ENTRY FROM PROJSCHEDULE PS JOIN SCHEDULE S ON S.SCHSEQ = PS.SCHSEQ JOIN ( SELECT P.PJTSEQ, P.PJTNAME, PM.MAIL FROM PROJECT P JOIN PROJECTMEMBER PM ON P.PJTSEQ = PM.PJTSEQ WHERE PM.MAIL = #{mail} ) PM ON PM.PJTSEQ = PS.PJTSEQ UNION SELECT S.STARTTIME, S.ENDTIME, T.TITLE, 'TASK' AS ENTRY FROM TASKSCHEDULE PS JOIN SCHEDULE S ON PS.SCHSEQ = S.SCHSEQ JOIN TASK T ON PS.TSKSEQ = T.TSKSEQ WHERE T.MAIL = #{mail}
